Package fr.sorbonne_u.components

Class AbstractComponent.AbstractService<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent.AbstractService<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentI.ComponentService<V>, java.util.concurrent.Callable<V>
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractComponent
    public abstract static class AbstractComponent.AbstractService<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComponentI.ComponentService<V>
    The abstract class AbstractService provides the basic method implementations for component service calls.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2018-09-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AbstractService()
      create a service callable which calls a service directly implemented by the object representing the component.
      AbstractService​(java.lang.String pluginURI)
      create a service callable which calls a service implemented by the designated plugin of the component.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      AbstractComponent getServiceOwner()
      return the reference to the component owner of the executor service that will execute this service call.
      java.lang.Object getServiceProviderReference()
      return the reference to the component owner or its plug-in that will execute this request.
      void setOwnerReference​(ComponentI owner)
      sets a reference to the owner component that can be used in the code of the request to access its services.

 post   true    // no postcondition.
